physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Mild dysmorphic appearance, generalized hypotonia, joint laxity, arachnodactyly, pectus excavatum, flexion contracture of the wrists, feet anomalies; right pneumothorax, ground glass appearance of lungs, elevation of right hemidiaphragm, scoliosis; mild left ventricular hypertrophy on ECG.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: At 6 months, dilation of the aneurysm progressed (ascending aorta 27 mm; aortic root 22 mm).
